articles.author: Ahmed Aboulenein
articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine boosters not widely needed, top FDA and WHO scientists say - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Top FDA and WHO scientists say COVID-19 vaccine boosters are not widely needed. The scientists said more evidence was needed to justify boosters, in contrast to the U.S. government plan to begin offering another round of shots to many fully vaccinated America…
articles.content:
A health-care worker prepares a dose of the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine at a UHN COVID-19 vaccine clinic in Toronto on Jan. 7.
Nathan Denette/The Canadian Press
Additional COVID-19 vaccine boo… [+2969 chars]

articles.author: Fox News Staff
articles.title: Sen. Mike Lee: Court-packing would reverse ‘central feature’ of Constitution - Fox News
articles.description: Sen. Mike Lee, R-Utah, on the heels of Justice Breyer joining ‘Fox News Sunday' this weekend to say he opposes the politics surrounding court-packing, told "America's Newsroom" Monday that packing the Supreme Court would "reverse a central feature" of the Con…
articles.content: Sen. Mike Lee, R-Utah, on the heels of Justice Stephen Breyer joining Fox News Sunday' this weekend to say he opposes the politics surrounding court-packing, told "America's Newsroom" Monday that pac… [+1285 chars]
